title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 396.4 - Review and determination by the office
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 396.4 - Review and determination by the office

State Regulations

When the office receives a written request for review, the office will review the arguments and evidence submitted by the individual. The office will issue a written response to the individual which shall be the
final determination of the office. The office will be entitled to keep the
intercepted lottery prize money when the time for requesting a review has
expired, or, if such request for a review was timely made, when a written
response has been issued by the office advising the individual that retention
of a specified portion of the lottery prize by the office if proper. Such
written response shall constitute a final determination of the
matter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
396.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
